vulnerabilities.title: push-dir Enables OS Command Injection
vulnerabilities.description: push-dir through 0.4.1 allows execution of arbritary commands. Arguments provided as part of the variable `opt.branch` is not validated before being provided to the `git` command within [index.js#L139](https://github.com/L33T-KR3W/push-dir/blob/master/index.js#L139). This could be abused by an attacker to inject arbitrary commands.
